bid(string,uint256).details: Call this function each time a user place a new bid

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

checkAuctionTimeExpired(string,uint256).details: Call this function to check if the time of the auction is over or not

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

returns._0: Returns a boolean to define if the auction time has expired (true) or not (false)

endAuction(string,uint256).details: This function is called from the front when the auction time is expired

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

initializeAuction(string,uint256,uint256.details: Call this function when the user decides to sell his NFT through an auction. The owner can define a starting price if he sends money in the transaction.

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

withdrawRefund(string,uint256).details: The user can call this function through the front when his bid is not the highest anymore.

params._nftCollection: Collection name of the given NFT
params._nftTokenID: Token ID of the given NFT

AuctionClosed(string,uint256,address,uin.notice: Event raised when the auction has finished

AuctionStarted(string,uint256,address).notice: Event raised when the auction has started

HighestBidIncreased(string,uint256,addre.notice: Event raised when the bid has increased

bid(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to place a new bid

checkAuctionTimeExpired(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to initiate a new auction

endAuction(string,uint256).notice: This function allows to close the auction

initializeAuction(string,uint256,uint256.notice: This function allows to initiate a new auction

withdrawRefund(string,uint256).notice: This function allows a user that placed a bid (not the highest anymore) to get back his funds
